vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.deposit (patch_9.sol#13-18):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.addMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_9.sol#16)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_9.sol#17)

external-function

solc-version

Detected issues with version pragma in patch_9.sol:

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in ETH_FUND.cashOut (patch_9.sol#20-25):
	-require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_am)()) patch_9.sol#24
